resource_explanation:
El Plano events API.

Event attributes :

 - `title` - Represents event name.
 - `description` - Represents event detailed description.
 - `status` - Represents event current status.
   - `confirmed` - The event is confirmed. This is the default status.
   - `tentative` - The event is tentatively confirmed.
   - `cancelled` - The event is cancelled (deleted).

 - `recurrence` - Represents recurrence rules.
 - `timezone` - Timezone settings.
 - `start_at` - Represents when event starts.
 - `end_at` - Represents when event ends.
 - timestamps

 Also, includes reference to the event creator and attached course.

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

parameters.name: course
parameters.description: The course to which the event is attached. Included in "relationships" category

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Soluta quo et.","description":"Soluta facere qui. Praesentium et est. Amet reiciendis aut. Corporis aspernatur rem. Quia voluptatem culpa.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-03-15","end_at":"2019-03-17","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]},"relationships":{"course":{"data":{"id":6,"type":"course"}}}}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/events" -d '{"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Soluta quo et.","description":"Soluta facere qui. Praesentium et est. Amet reiciendis aut. Corporis aspernatur rem. Quia voluptatem culpa.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-03-15","end_at":"2019-03-17","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]},"relationships":{"course":{"data":{"id":6,"type":"course"}}}}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 3f32c23d4403f9d9c8d7493df43a461b3458ac748053c901c6fe78078cfc133a" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
